import { Fragment, useEffect } from "react" import { StarIcon } from "@heroicons/react/20/solid" import { Tab } from "@headlessui/react" import { useContext } from "react" import projects from "../projects" import PortfolioContext from "../context/PortfolioContext" function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(" ") } export default function Project() { let project const { about, yoodlize, wedding, techBlog, weather, blackjack, date, projects, resume, contact, } = useContext(PortfolioContext) const handleWhatProject = () => { if (yoodlize){ project = projects[5] } else if (wedding){ project = projects[0] } } useEffect(()=>{ }) return (
{/* Product */}
{/* Product image */}
{/* Product details */}

{project.name}

Product information

Version {project.version.name} (Updated{" "} {projects.version.date} )

Description:

{project.description}

Method:

{project.paragraph}

What was used:

    {project.highlights.map((highlight) => (
  • {highlight}
    • ))}
) }
